channel.title: PuG : An Original Media For Gamers Production
channel.itunes:subtitle: PuG
channel.itunes:author: Jesse Cox
channel.description: “Pick up Group” is the culmination of years of hardwork and dedication - thrown right out the window. An interview show that defies convention and dares you to listen to it’s unscripted antics. Jesse Cox leads an all-star group of ever changing talent from around the interwebs in a discussion about gaming, culture, and other stuff that will be sure to make you laugh. If not, hey, it’s free.

image.title: PuG : An Original Media For Gamers Production
